title: The Homotopy Theory of $A_\infty$Categories
abstract:
In this paper we describe the homotopy category of the $A_\infty$categories.
To do that we introduce the notion of semi-free $A_\infty$category, which plays
the role of standard cofibration. Moreover, we define the non unital $A_\infty$
(resp. DG)categories with cofibrant morphisms and we prove that any non unital
$A_\infty$ (resp. DG)category has a resolution of this kind.
